    Compute Pseudotime-Aware MI Networks

    compute_pseudotime_mi_network.Rd

    Compute Pseudotime-Aware MI Networks

    Usage

    compute_pseudotime_mi_network(
  seurat_obj,
  cluster_id,
  cluster_field,
  pseudotime_col,
  assay_name = "RNA",
  counts_layer = "counts",
  data_layer = "data",
  n_bins = 5,
  min_cells_bin = 75,
  top_n_genes = 5000,
  max_cells = 1500,
  min_expr_pct = 0.05,
  n_cores = parallel::detectCores() - 1,
  bin_method = "quantile"
)

    Arguments

    seurat_obj

    Seurat object

    cluster_id

    Cluster ID

    cluster_field

    Metadata column name for clusters

    pseudotime_col

    Metadata column name for pseudotime

    assay_name

    Assay name (default: "RNA")

    counts_layer

    Layer for counts data (default: "counts")

    data_layer

    Layer for normalized data (default: "data")

    n_bins

    Number of pseudotime bins

    min_cells_bin

    Minimum cells per bin

    top_n_genes

    Number of top variable genes

    max_cells

    Maximum number of cells

    min_expr_pct

    Minimum expression percentage

    n_cores

    Number of cores

    bin_method

    Binning method ("quantile" or "equal_width")

    Value

    List of MI networks per pseudotime bin
